name: Coco Vase S
description: The Coco Vase is an elegant piece with it's exquisite quilted detailing. Available in 2 other sizes. All our vases are inlaid with a fibre-glass interior to support water. Handmade in Philippines with Pen Shell or Shagreen, bronze-patina brass. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Shagreen-covered items should be kept out of direct sunlight; color variants may occur, showcasing the authentic luxurious use of natural components.
